ModMetaData.name: Power Alerts
ModMetaData.author: diddily
ModMetaData.description: Adds alerts for when your power grid needs attention, including: Disconnected generators, batteries close to being empty, buildings at risk of short circuit and fueled generators almost out of fuel. Configuratable options included. (This is the dev version of Power Alerts. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!) Dependencies This mod depends on Hugslib. Load order should be: Hugslib -> Power Alerts.
